data.eml:eml: Hessebiusluculentus, a new species of the genus Hessebius Verhoeff, 1941 from China (Lithobiomorpha, Lithobiidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ma, Huiqin, Lu, Yanmin, Liu, Haipeng, Hou, Xiaojie, Pei, Sujian (2018): Hessebiusluculentus, a new species of the genus Hessebius Verhoeff, 1941 from China (Lithobiomorpha, Lithobiidae). ZooKeys 741: 193-202, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.741.20061, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.741.20061
